pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This is a dynamic, time-lapse video showcasing a spacious public square centered around a prominent monument with a golden, ornate top. The scene is set under a dramatic, cloudy sky with surrounding trees and buildings. While the focus is on the scenery, there is some minor subject motion, including a boy running across the plaza and people on scooters appearing briefly.
